data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Busan in the half of Incheon Utd.
Ji Um Cho awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, Throw-in Incheon Utd.
Busan takes a corner from the right.
Throw-in for Busan in the half of Incheon Utd.
In the minute 6, Can Busan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Incheon Utd's half?
Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Incheon Utd in their own half.
Ji Um Cho signals a Busan throw-in in Incheon Utd's half.
In the minute 9, In Incheon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Busan's Kim Dong-woo is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
In the minute 12, Ji Um Cho signals a throw-in for Incheon Utd, close to Busan's area.
Goal kick for Busan at Incheon Football Stadium.
Ball safe as Incheon Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 15, Incheon Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Incheon.
Incheon Utd to take a throw-in in Busan territory.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Incheon Utd.
Ban-Suk Oh (Incheon Utd) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Busan have a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Ji Um Cho has awarded Incheon Utd a corner.
Incheon Utd's Kim Do-hyeok misses with an attempt on goal.
Ji Um Cho awards Busan a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Incheon Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Incheon Utd are in shooting range from this free kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Incheon Utd goal kick.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Incheon Utd are pushing forward but Ji Eon-hak's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Incheon.
In the minute 26, Busan to take a throw-in in Incheon Utd territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Incheon Utd in their own half.
In the minute 27, Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Busan.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd at Incheon Football Stadium.
Incheon Utd takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 30, Can Busan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Incheon Utd's half?
Ji Um Cho awards Incheon Utd a goal kick.
Busan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 31, Can Incheon Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Busan's half?
Busan needs to be cautious. Incheon Utd have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Busan in their own half.
In the minute 34, Free kick Busan.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd at Incheon Football Stadium.
Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ji Um Cho signals a Busan throw-in in Incheon Utd's half.
In the minute 37, Yang Jun-ah (Incheon Utd) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Busan in the half of Incheon Utd.
In the minute 38, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Busan in their own half.
Ball safe as Busan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 40, Ji Um Cho awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Busan in the half of Incheon Utd.
Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Incheon Utd in their own half.
In the minute 42, Free kick Incheon Utd.
Can Incheon Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Busan's half?
Corner awarded to Incheon Utd.
In the minute 44, Busan move into a 0-1 lead through a Lee Dong-jun header.
Busan will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Incheon Utd.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Busan goal kick.
Incheon Utd pushes forward through Stefan Mugosa, whose finish on goal is saved.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Kim Do-hyeok of Incheon Utd smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 46, Busan to take a throw-in in Incheon Utd territory.
Incheon Utd make their first substitution with Kim Dae-jung replacing Kim Jun-beom.
Busan are whistled for offside.
In Incheon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 50, Mun Ji-hwan of Incheon Utd gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Busan at Incheon Football Stadium.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
In the minute 52, Throw-in Busan.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd at Incheon Football Stadium.
Incheon Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 53, Busan have a goal kick.
The away team replace Romulo with Park Jun-kang.
Ji Um Cho has awarded Busan a corner.
In the minute 56, Incheon Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
Song Shi-uh is replacing Kim Do-hyeok for the home team.
In the minute 57, Ball safe as Busan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ji Um Cho awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in the half of Busan.
In the minute 58, Ji Um Cho signals a Incheon Utd throw-in in Busan's half.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Incheon Utd.
In the minute 63, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Incheon Utd close to the penalty box.
Kim Myeong-jun (Busan) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Incheon Utd just outside Busan's area.
Kang Min-soo is on a sub for Kim Myeong-jun for Busan.
In the minute 65, Ji Um Cho signals a Incheon Utd throw-in in Busan's half.
Stefan Mugosa (Incheon Utd) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Stefan Mugosa (Incheon Utd) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 68, Incheon Utd to take a throw-in in Busan territory.
Lee Kyu-seong (Busan) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Incheon Utd have a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Incheon Utd.
Ji Um Cho has awarded Incheon Utd a corner.
Ball goes out of play for a Busan goal kick.
In the minute 71, Can Incheon Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Busan's half?
Busan are coming forward and Lee Sang-jun gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Incheon Utd at Incheon Football Stadium.
In the minute 75, Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through a header from Kim Dae-jung.
Great play from Stefan Mugosa to set up the goal.
Goal! Jeong Dong-yun gives Incheon Utd a 2-1 lead.
In the minute 76, That's a fine assist from Song Shi-uh.
Ji Um Cho awards Incheon Utd a goal kick.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
In the minute 79, Free kick Busan.
Rashid Mahazi is on a sub for Elias Aguilar for Incheon Utd.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd in their own half.
In the minute 81, Busan make their third substitution with Hyeon Kim replacing Lee Sang-jun.
Free kick for Busan in the half of Incheon Utd.
Lee Dong-jun (Busan) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 83, Kim Jung-hyun (Busan) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Busan drives forward and Lee Dong-jun gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Busan.
In the minute 84, It's a goal kick for the home team in Incheon.
Throw-in for Busan in the half of Incheon Utd.
Can Incheon Utd capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 87, Ji Um Cho awards Busan a goal kick.
Busan takes a corner from the left.
Busan's Lee Dong-jun is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 89, Busan drive upfield and Kim Dong-woo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Incheon Utd defender.
Incheon Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Incheon Utd in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Incheon Utd's Stefan Mugosa misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Incheon.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Throw-in Busan.
Throw-in for Busan at Incheon Football Stadium.
Incheon Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
Park Jun-kang (Busan) has received a first yellow card.
